heading: HR00974
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE LEADERS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO DIRECT THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, OVER THE SERIOUS ALLEGATIONS MADE BY PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE THAT "LOBBY MONEY" WAS INVOLVED IN THE COMMISSION ON APPOINTMENT'S REJECTION OF MS. REGINA LOPEZ IN ORDER TO HOLD THOSE RESPONSIBLE ACCOUNTABLE TO THEIR ACTIONS, OR IF PROVEN BASELESS, DEMAND AN APOLOGY FROM THE PRESIDENT FOR BESMIRCHING THE REPUTATION OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-05-15
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00974
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE LEADERS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO DIRECT THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, OVER THE SERIOUS ALLEGATIONS MADE BY PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE THAT "LOBBY MONEY" WAS INVOLVED IN THE COMMISSION ON APPOINTMENT'S REJECTION OF MS. REGINA LOPEZ IN ORDER TO HOLD THOSE RESPONSIBLE ACCOUNTABLE TO THEIR ACTIONS, OR IF PROVEN BASELESS, DEMAND AN APOLOGY FROM THE PRESIDENT FOR BESMIRCHING THE REPUTATION OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2017-05-15
